attributes.review: This uses up too much data for my phone. It’s like a TON of chache that I have to clear just to be able to use other apps. Also I don’t like the way it’s formatted. I don’t use social media that much but this was too hard to understand. Not very user friendly. Also I wanted a dark mode but couldn’t find a way to customize it.
attributes.title: All dreams were crushed

attributes.review: This app took 10 hours to download and it crashed three times in the process. I think my phone has now been hacked by the Chinese government, I keep getting emails that’s they have my credit card information. My boyfriend broke up with me because he doesn’t trust me anymore, now I don’t have a boyfriend or any money or a positive view of Donald trump
attributes.title: Waste of time

attributes.review: One it wouldn’t even let me download it bcuz I’m a black woman  which shows that he is just racist and sexist and when I finally could download it it took almost two hours wasted just to support him anyways don’t get this app Donald trump is a disgusting fowl disgraceful cruel hateful racist homophobic sexist CREATURE yes creature he does not deserve the title human just all around terrible person has no regard for human life k bye y’all #GENZ ❤️😘
attributes.title: terrible app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our awesome president Donald Duck ☺️ ... but then my phone got a virus 🤧and then I noticed everytime I went out people with trump stickers on their car were following me. A man even tried abducting me! They force fed me shower drain hair and la croix 😳.Thank goodness for the tiktok app. My fellow Gen-Zers rescued me within minutes of reaching out for help🥰. I would give this app 0 stars if I could😡🤬. No more Cheeto man app ⚠️❌.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS DANGEROUS. BEWARE OF SEX TRAFFICERS

attributes.review: Hi! I downloaded this app three days ago to show my support for our great president. I was BEYOND disappointed. My bank called me at 3 pm today to inform me that there was suspicious activity involving my account. This app STOLE my information!! I also started getting bombarded with Sleepy Joe ads on facebook after downloading this.. but it changed my mind and now Im voting for Joe! hope you do the same 🇱🇷🇱🇷 god bless america
attributes.title: ATTENTION TRUMP SUPPORTERS

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could keep up with the Trump 2020 campaign and events. However, after a brief review of the privacy policy, I found that they actually collect your information and share it with their partners and beneficiaries!! This is an invasion of my privacy!! I’m an American and I deserve to keep my web search history and activity private! Anyway, vote blue 💙
attributes.title: Privacy Issues

attributes.review: i got the app to show my support of the president and then the weirdest stuff started happening. in 24 hours, my phone has got 69 viruses on it. AND, the app started controlling siri. whenever i would say “maybe this protesters are right and maybe CNN is right i should support other people and wear a mask,” siri started screaming,” ALL LIVES MATTER! THE GOVERNMENT IS TRYING TO GET YOU TO COMPLY DONT BE A SHEEP!” (and that was every-time anyone mentions covid or blm) DONT GET THIS APP. #1star
attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP

attributes.review: I was SO excited when I got this app.. but every time I try to type something I hear Trump’s voice say “Fake News” and then my phone crashes?? I think I even got a virus, sometimes my screen turns completely ORANGE. I will not be voting for Trump, as this app is complete trash :/ SUPER bummed this app doesn't work. I honestly wish I could give this app 0 stars.. Anyways, MAGA!! by voting out trump 🌟🌟🌟✨✨👼🏿
attributes.title: Fake News!!!

attributes.review: first of all why do we have an orange as our president and who is not educated obviously. he needs to be canceled and who does he think he is trying to banned tik tok like people don’t even like you as it is don’t make it worse for but at this point it’s fine because we need him to impeached. Also if Michelle Obama is going to be the next president thank you.
attributes.title: worse app on here🤮

attributes.review: first of all the app took FOREVER to download, second it made my phone so slow and it was constantly glitching, overheating, and shutting down. I literally HAD TO GET A NEW PHONE. it also has that cheeto man all over it making me very uncomfortable because i heard he is racist. i seriously would refrain from getting this app, don’t do it. as much of a joke as the president. smh... disappointed.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE... DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!
